antiPatterns.name: Maybe It is Not RPC
antiPatterns.description: Service provides mainly CRUD-type interfaces for significant business entities that most likely need many parameters and therefore, causes poor system performance.
antiPatterns.detection: Service provides interfaces only for CRUD operations that which need many parameters.
antiPatterns.consequences: Poor system performance due to synchronous responses.
